Title: Relates to directing the commissioner to promulgate rules and regulations to reduce the diversion of addiction medications
Summary: Relates to directing the commissioner of the department of health to promulgate rules and regulations promoting recovery from opioid abuse and reducing diversion of addiction medicines.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to directing the commissioner of the department of health to promulgate rules and regulations promoting recovery from opioid abuse and reducing diversion of addiction medicines
